remarks: The set ` W ` is the collection of all non-principal Dirichlet characters such that the sum ` sum_ n e. NN , X ( n ) / n ` is equal to zero.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
rpvmasum.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchrisum.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrisum.n1 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .1. ) $.
dchrvmasumif.f $e |- F = ( a e. NN |-> ( ( X ` ( L ` a ) ) / a ) ) $.
dchrvmasumif.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
dchrvmasumif.s $e |- ( ph -> seq 1 ( + , F ) ~~> S ) $.
dchrvmasumif.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. y e. ( 1 [,) +oo ) ( abs ` ( ( seq 1 ( + , F ) ` ( |_ ` y ) ) - S ) ) <_ ( C / y ) ) $.
dchrvmaeq0.w $e |- W = { y e. ( D \ { .1. } ) | sum_ m e. NN ( ( y ` ( L ` m ) ) / m ) = 0 } $.
dchrvmaeq0 $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. W <-> S = 0 ) ) $.
